Articles.Content:
Hello there everyone! I've recently started a channel in which I make cinematic videos of KSP. It's my first shot at doing any sort of cinematic video, so I hope everyone likes it-- even if you don't, that's okay. Constructive criticism is very much appreciated!

Having to reupload because of quiet audio. Will keep the old one up for now until I reupload. If you watch it now, make sure your volume is maxed out.

I plan to make more and improve as I get more feedback. I'm pretty new to editing, after all. I use incompetech music, which I usually build the video around. I'll post more if and when I choose to make them.

Edited August 8, 2013 by drvonkitty

What do you use to edit? Is it free

Where are you hiding this editor software!

It looks like Sony Vegas for the editing software.

Now for the video although the lack of shots (or the too long video), it is great and breathtaking. It misses action too. But it is a great start ! With a little story line, videos will be a whole lot better.
